about_the_game:
Transport Gallery

This Transport-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Motorised, traditional and modern!

Create imagery of the various fascinating ways to traverse the world!

Contents

The Transport gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Chinook
  • Airship
  • Tram
  • Penny Farthing
  • Airport
  • Limo
  • Bus
  • Paddle Steamer
  • Parachute
  • Red Arrows
  • Blueprint
  • Carriaga
  • Subway
  • Train Ticket
  • Underground
  • Route Plan
  • Davinci
  • The Athena
  • Tuk-Tuk
  • Helicopter
  • Tanker

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: WooLoop - Transport Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: This Transport-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Motorised, traditional and modern! Crate imagery of the various fascinating ways to traverse the world!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
